data.title: Mapping geographical inequalities in access to drinking water and sanitation facilities in low-income and middle-income countries, 2000â€“17
data.meta_description: Universal access to safe drinking water and sanitation facilities is an essential human right, recognised in the Sustainable Development Goals as crucial for preventing disease and improving human wellbeing. Comprehensive, high-resolution estimates are ...
